headline.main: FROM LONDON.; Dull Times The Queen's Health-Discouraging Prospects Lord Palmerston's Poliey Another Reform Bill Expected, & c.

docs.lead_paragraph: The papers announce every day the departure of more distinguished persons from London. The Park is not so full every afternoon as it was a month ago. Tradespeople are selling off their stock for what it will bring, and complain bitterly of the badness of the season.

headline.main: RETURN OF THE TWENTIETH REGIMENT NEW-YORK STATE MILITIA.

headline.main: GEN. BANKS' COMMAND.; REPORTED ADVANCE OF THE REBEL FORCES.

docs.lead_paragraph: No important movements have yet taken place. An additional force has been sent to guard the ford at Harper's Ferry. On Tuesday night it was reported that considerable bodies of rebel foragers were within six miles of the Ferry, which gives rise to the suspicion that a much larger body is nearer us than Leesburgh. Some think that Gen. JOHNSTON'S army is on the move northward.

keywords.value: CIVIL WAR (THE WAR BETWEEN THE STATES)

docs.snippet: The Sanitary Commission, through its Secretary, Mr. OLMSTED, has made its first Report; and a very direct, explicit document it is, even if not vert encouraging. The Commission wastes no words on generalties or medical and philosophical theories, but...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Sanitary Commission, through its Secretary, Mr. OLMSTED, has made its first Report; and a very direct, explicit document it is, even if not vert encouraging. The Commission wastes no words on generalties or medical and philosophical theories, but go straight to the practical matters of food and drink, night soil and drainage, clothing and cleanliness, and the other very plain conditions of a soldier's health.

headline.main: THE CULINARY WANTS OF THE ARMY.; REPORT OF MR. SANDERSON.

docs.lead_paragraph: To the Sanitary Commission of the United States: GENTLEMEN: In obedience to your orders, I pro- ceeded on the 13th inst., to the camp of the Fifteenth Regimint New-York Volunteers, Col. McLEOD MURPHY, by whom I was courteously received, and the culinary arrangements of the command at once placed under my direction.
